content: i ve been making these freehand for a while and finally decided to write it down as i went so i could share the pattern with others this pattern has not been tested worked in the round do not join abreviations chain - chain st - stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase - increase rsc - reverse single_crochet materials 5mm hook any yarn scrap works great if it is a thin yarn double strand would work better i like to mix in fuzzy and fun fur yarns for texture scissors stitch marker needle for weaving in ends gauge not important
